Source.Name: python-typing
Source.Summary: Backport of the standard library typing module
Source.Description: This is a backport of the standard library typing module to Python versions older than 3.5. Typing defines a standard notation for Python function and variable type annotations. The notation can be used for documenting code in a concise, standard format, and it has been designed to also be used by static and runtime type checkers, static analyzers, IDEs and other tools.

Package.Name: python-typing
Package.Summary: Backport of the standard library typing module
